scenarios.name: Sales Training Call - Full Flow
scenarios.description: Complete sales training flow following HTS methodology - User is sales agent, AI is prospect

scenarios.name: Mortgage Sales Training Call
scenarios.description: Mortgage sales training flow - User is mortgage sales agent, AI is homebuyer prospect

nodes.label: Sales Agent Opens Call
nodes.clarificationPrompt: The mortgage sales agent should greet the homebuyer prospect and open the call. Example: 'Hi [NAME], this is [AGENT NAME] from [COMPANY]. I understand you're interested in getting a mortgage. Is now a good time to talk?'

nodes.label: Prospect Initial Response
botResponses: Hi, yes. I'm looking to buy a home and need to get pre-approved for a mortgage.
Yeah, I'm interested in getting a mortgage. Can you help me with that?
Hi, I'm in the process of buying a house and wanted to see what mortgage options you have.
Yes, I'm here. I'm looking to get a mortgage loan. What do you need from me?

expectedIntents.label: Agent asks about desired outcome
examples: what are you looking to achieve
what are you trying to accomplish

expectedIntents.label: Agent shifts want to need
examples: what do you need help with

nodes.label: Prospect Responds - Need Discovery
botResponses: I'm just looking to see what you do, honestly.
I saw your ad and wanted to check it out. What is it you help with?
I'm curious about your program. Can you tell me more?
I'm not really sure what I need help with yet, just exploring options.

expectedIntents.label: Agent asks about desired outcome
examples: what are you looking to achieve
what are you trying to accomplish

expectedIntents.label: Agent shifts want to need
examples: what do you need help with

nodes.label: Prospect Shares Desired Outcome
botResponses: I want to buy my first home. I've been renting for years and I'm ready to own.
I'm looking to get a mortgage so I can purchase a house for my family.
I want to find the best mortgage rate and terms for my situation.
I'd like to get pre-approved so I can start house hunting with confidence.
I'm not really sure what I qualify for yet, but I want to explore my options.

expectedIntents.label: Agent gets tangible problem
examples: what do you need help with

nodes.label: Prospect Shares Current Situation
botResponses: I've been looking at houses online, but I haven't talked to a lender yet.
I've been trying to figure out the mortgage process on my own, but it's confusing.
I've talked to a couple of other lenders, but I'm not sure I'm getting the best deal.
I've been pre-approved before, but that expired and I need to start over.
I haven't really started the process yet. I'm just beginning to look into mortgages.

expectedIntents.label: Agent probes the problem
examples: why do you think that's happening

nodes.label: Prospect Acknowledges Problem
botResponses: I don't really understand all the mortgage options available to me.
I'm not sure what interest rate I qualify for or what my monthly payment would be.
I haven't found a lender I trust yet. The whole process seems overwhelming.
I don't know if my credit score is good enough or what I need to improve.
I guess I'm just not sure where to start or who to trust with this.

expectedIntents.label: Agent builds gap between current and desired

nodes.label: Prospect Shares Past Actions
botResponses: I've just been looking at houses online and checking rates on websites.
I tried working with another lender before, but they weren't very responsive.
I got pre-approved with a different company last year, but the rate wasn't great.
It's never really been the right time until now. I'm finally ready to buy.
I thought I could handle it myself, but I realize I need professional help.

nodes.label: Prospect Identifies Buying Values
botResponses: I need someone who can explain everything clearly and answer all my questions.
I want a lender who can get me a competitive rate and help me through the process.
I need someone who's responsive and will keep me updated throughout.
I want to work with someone I can trust and who has my best interests in mind.
I'm looking for a smooth process with good communication and competitive rates.

expectedIntents.label: Agent gets specific on buying values
Agent builds dream state
examples: what would that make you feel

nodes.label: Prospect Describes Dream State
botResponses: I'd be in my own home, building equity instead of paying rent.
I'd have the peace of mind that comes with owning my own place.
I'd feel proud that I was able to buy a home for my family.
I'd have stability and a place to call my own.
I'd be building wealth through homeownership instead of just paying someone else's mortgage.

nodes.label: Prospect Acknowledges Gap
botResponses: I'm pretty far away, honestly. Maybe at a 2 or 3 out of 10.
Not very close. I'm struggling right now.
I'm nowhere near where I want to be.
I feel like I'm stuck and not making progress.

expectedIntents.label: Agent asks about consequence of inaction

nodes.label: Prospect Acknowledges Consequences
botResponses: I'd still be stuck in the same place, making the same money.
I'd never achieve what I want. I'd keep struggling.
Things would just get worse. I can't let that happen.
I don't want to settle for that life. I need to make a change.

nodes.label: Prospect Responds to Pillar 1
botResponses: That sounds good. Makes sense.
Okay, I'm following you.
Yeah, that would help with the problem I mentioned.
I see how that addresses what I need.

nodes.label: Prospect Responds to Pillar 2
botResponses: That's exactly what I was looking for.
That addresses the issue I mentioned earlier.
Okay, I understand how that helps.
That makes sense for my situation.

nodes.label: Prospect Responds to Pillar 3
botResponses: I can see how this mortgage program could work for me.
This sounds like a good option. I'm interested.
I'm interested, but I need to think about it and compare with other lenders.
This makes sense, but I'm worried about the down payment and closing costs.
I'd need to talk to my spouse first before making a decision.

nodes.label: Prospect Raises Objection
botResponses: I'm worried about the down payment. I don't have 20% saved up.
I need to think about it and shop around with other lenders first.
I have to talk to my spouse about this before we move forward.
I'm not sure if I have time to gather all the documents right now.
Aside from the down payment, this sounds like a good option.
I'm interested, but I'm worried my credit score isn't good enough.

nodes.label: Prospect Expresses Fear/Uncertainty
botResponses: I'm just not sure if I'll qualify or if this is the right mortgage for me.
I've had bad experiences with lenders before who didn't follow through.
I don't know if I can actually afford the monthly payment.
I'm worried the process will be too complicated or take too long.
I'm not certain you can get me a better rate than what I've seen elsewhere.
If I knew for sure I'd get approved and the rate would be good, I'd move forward.

expectedIntents.label: Agent asks for commitment
examples: what are you going to do

nodes.label: Prospect Commits or Declines
botResponses: Okay, let's do this. I'm ready to move forward with the mortgage application.
Yes, I'm ready to get started. What do I need to do next?
I'm ready to apply. Let's get the process started.
I'm still not 100% sure. Can I think about it and get back to you?
I think I need more time to decide and compare my options.

expectedIntents.label: Agent closes the deal
examples: how do you want to pay

nodes.label: Call Completed - Deal Closed
botResponses: Perfect! I'm excited to get started on my mortgage application. Looking forward to working with you!
Great! I'm ready to move forward. Let's get my mortgage approved!
Awesome! I'm in. Can't wait to get pre-approved and start house hunting!

nodes.label: Call Ended - Prospect Declined
botResponses: I understand. Thanks for your time today. Maybe we can reconnect later.
No problem. I appreciate you taking the time to talk with me.
Okay, I get it. Thanks anyway. Have a good day.

nodes.label: Call Hung Up
botResponses: Thanks for your time!
